message: I'm excited to offer you this unique product at a special price. I think you'll really appreciate its value.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. Can you meet me halfway?
I understand you're interested in the product, but I'm not sure I can meet you at $12000. How about we meet at $14000?
I'm still interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go above $13000. Can you consider meeting me at $13000?
I appreciate your persistence, but I'm not willing to go as low as $13000. How about we meet at $14500?
I'm getting a bit frustrated with the back-and-forth, but I'm still willing to negotiate. Can you meet me at $12500?
I understand you're getting frustrated, but I'm not willing to go as low as $12500. Let's meet in the middle at $13750
I'm getting close to walking away, but I'll make one more offer. Can you meet me at $12000?
I'm not willing to go as low as $12000, but I'm willing to make a compromise. How about we meet at $13200?
I'm not willing to go any higher. I'll make one final offer: $11500. If you can't meet me there, I'll have to walk away.
